channel.title: Zamorak Stole Glitch
channel.description:
Alright yesterday I added Guthix, Saradomin, Zamorak stole to my server. Guthix and Saradomin work perfectly but when you equip the Zamorak one it makes almost all of your body disappear. I checked Item and Item 4 files and All the stoles are in the right places. So I honestly do [b]NOT[/b] know why the Zamorak one is messed up.. Bah Help?
Also if you need any of the ID's for Guthix, Saradomin, Or Zamorak Robes, Mitres, Stoles, Cloaks or Croziers let me know I have all the newer god ID's really :)
Thanks in advance to anyone who can help me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2008, 01:48:35 PM[/size][hr]Here's ID's for awsome Guthix, Zamorak, Saradomin Items =)
(Removed the ID's and posted under different thread so everyone that wanted them could find the correct title)

item.title: Zamorak Stole Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Evilpker1234 Evilpker1234
item.description:
@Evilpker1234 wrote:

Incognito I already said in the post that I have done that. They are all in the right place. I know how to work Item and Item.4 they are all set correctly and all work except the glitch of the Zamorak stole turning your body invisable.

Read full topic

item.title: Zamorak Stole Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:
@Incognito wrote:

Go into item4.java (if you have it) or item.java (If you have item4.java go into it)… Find which place you need the stoles at which is most likely in the “Amulet” place, add the Item ID at the very end of the “Amulet” list of ID’s.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Evilpker1234 Evilpker1234
item.description:
@Evilpker1234 wrote:

Hmm, Well that kind of makes sense, but then again wouldn’t Saradomin and Guthix Stoles be messed up too?

Read full topic

item.title: Zamorak Stole Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

jagex change there file type a month ago so the new models could be using a different file type

You are correct but the server Id will stay the same because they are not dirctly being updated with the jagex chache and server files
